role.argrole: entity arg0's eyes are fixed on

example.parse: (IP (QP-TMP (ADVP (AD 短短)) (QP (CD 十几) (CLP (M 年)))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (DP (DT 这) (CLP (M 项))) (NP (NN 事业))) (VP (VV 获得) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 中外)) (VP (VV 瞩目) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 成就)))))

(IP (NP-SBJ (DNP (NP-PN (NR 中国)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 金融) (NN 改革))) (VP (VV 取得) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 令) (NP-OBJ (NN 人)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 瞩目))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 成就)))))
